CreatePathRewrites.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tsf.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePathRewrites
<公共请求参数>

{
    "PathRewrites": {
        "Regex": "xx", 
        "GatewayGroupId": "xx", 
        "Blocked": "xx", 
        "Order": 0, 
        "Replacement": "xx"
    }
}
